user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend next month. Can you give me a fun fact about the date June 21st? Also, suggest some popular songs from the genre 'Pop' that I can play at the party. Additionally, find the current exchange rate from USD to EUR, as I need to purchase decorations from Europe.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a fun fact about June 21st.
Suggest popular songs from the genre 'Pop' suitable for a birthday party.
Get the current exchange rate from USD to EUR.
